00021 /**
00022 * @brief C++/CLI Swap for exception safe copy.
00023 * @param one First Object.
00024 * @param two Second Object.
00025 */
00026 template<class T >
00027 Void inline swap( T% one, T% two )
00028 {
00029         T tmp( one );
00030         one = two;
00031         two = tmp;
00032 };

00036 /** \class  InteractionKind
00037 * Collection of Interaction types
00038 */
00039 public enum class InteractionKind
00040 {
00041         CBond,        //Chemical Bonding
00042         HFC,          //Hyperfine Coupling
00043         CShielding,   //Chemical Shielding
00044         Shift,        //Chemical Shift
00045         GTensor,      //G-Tensor
00046         ZFS,          //Zero Field Splitting
00047         Exchange,     //Exchange Coupling
00048         Quadrupolar,  //Quadropolar interaction
00049         Dipolar,      //Dipolar interaction
00050         Jcoupling,    //J-Coupling
00051         spinrotation  //Spin rotation
00052 };

00054 /** \class  Matrix3x3
00055 *  Class for storing a 3x3 observable matrix.
00056 */
00057 public ref class  Matrix3x3:INotifyPropertyChanged
00058 {
00059 public:
00060         /**
00061         * @brief Constructor of Matrix3x3 initalizing ObservableCollection with 9 elements.
00062         */
00063         Matrix3x3(){ matrix3x3=gcnew ObservableCollection<double>(); for (int i=0;i<9;i++) matrix3x3->Add(0.0f);};
00064 
00065         /**
00066         * @brief Event for when something changes inside the matrix object.
00067         */
00068         virtual event PropertyChangedEventHandler^ PropertyChanged;
00069 
00070         /**
00071         * @brief Property [] for giving or setting the element of the matrix.
00072         */
00073         property double default[int] {
00074                 double get (int index) {return matrix3x3[index];};
00075                 void set (int index, double value) 
00076                 {
00077                         matrix3x3[index]=value;
00078 
00079                         //Call the event handler as element changed
00080                         OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs("Matrix3x3"));
00081                 };
00082 };
00083 private:
00084         ObservableCollection<double>^ matrix3x3;     ///< The observable collection
00085 
00086         /**
00087         * @brief Event Handler when the collection is changed
00088         * @param e Arguments for when an property changed. Usually a string.
00089         */
00090         virtual System::Void OnPropertyChanged(PropertyChangedEventArgs^ e) sealed{PropertyChanged(this, e);};
00091 };

00157          /**
00158          * @brief Property IntKind for giving or setting the interaction kind of the interaction.
00159          */
00160          property InteractionKind IntKind{
00161                  InteractionKind get() {return intKind;}
00162                  void  set(InteractionKind aIntKind)
00163                  {
00164                          //Try to change kind of interaction, else exception will be thrown
00165                          try{
00166                                  //Checks the vadility of the interaction using 
00167                                  //new interaction kind, else throws exception.
00168                                  ValidCreationChange(a, b, aIntKind, "change to ");
00169 
00170                                  //Save old interaction kind, change interaction kind and fire the change event
00171                                  InteractionKind oldintKind=intKind;
00172                                  intKind=aIntKind;
00173                                  OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs("InteractionKind " +oldintKind.ToString()));
00174                          }
00175                          catch(String^ e){throw e;};
00176                  };
00177          };
00178 
00179          /**
00180          * @brief Property Label for giving or setting the label of the interaction.

00188                          OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs("Label"));

00192          /**
00193          * @brief Property A for giving or setting the atom B of the interaction.
00194          */
00195          property Atom^ A{
00196                  Atom^ get() {return a;}
00197                  void  set(Atom^ tA)
00198                  {
00199                          //Try to change atom, else exception will be thrown
00200                          try{
00201                                  //Checks the vadility of the interaction using 
00202                                  //the new A atom and the atom B, else throws exception.
00203                                  ValidCreationChange(tA, b, intKind, "change to ");
00204 
00205                                  //Change the atom A and fire the change event
00206                                  a=tA;
00207                                  OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs("A"));
00208                          }
00209                          catch(String^ e){throw e;};
00210                  };
00211          };
00212

00214          * @brief Property B for giving or setting the atom B of the interaction.

00217                  Atom^ get() {return b;}

00219                  {  
00220                          //Try to change atom, else exception will be thrown
00221                          try{
00222                                  //Checks the vadility of the interaction using 
00223                                  //the A atom and the new atom B, else throws exception.
00224                                  ValidCreationChange(a, tB, intKind, "change to ");
00225 
00226                                  //Change the atom B and fire the change event
00227                                  b=tB;
00228                                  OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs("B"));
00229                          }
00230                          catch(String^ e){throw e;};
00231                  };
00232          };

00309         {Calculate_EigenStates(); OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs(e->PropertyName));};

00313 /** \class  InteractionsDictionary
00314 *  Class for storing an observable Interactions collection.
00315 */
00316 public ref class InteractionsDictionary: INotifyCollectionChanged, 
00317                                                                   INotifyPropertyChanged
00318 {
00319 
00320 public:
00321         InteractionsDictionary();
00322 
00323         /**
00324         * @brief Event for when something changes inside the collection.
00325         */
00326         virtual event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler^ CollectionChanged;
00327 
00328         /**
00329         * @brief Event for when a property changes. Not used
00330         */
00331         virtual event PropertyChangedEventHandler^ PropertyChanged;
00332 
00333         /**
00334         * @brief Getter for the number of interactions fo specific kind.
00335         * @param IntKind The kinf of interaction that the number of which we want.
00336         * @result Return number of interactions.
00337         */
00338         int GetInterKindCount(InteractionKind IntKind){return InterKindCount[IntKind];};
00339 
00340         //Other functions
00341         System::Void Add(Interaction^ inter);
00342         System::Void Clear();
00343         System::Void RemoveAt(int aID);
00344 
00345         //Properties
00346 
00347         /**
00348         * @brief Property Count for giving the number of interactions in the collection.
00349         */
00350         property int Count {
00351                 int get ()  {return newID-1;};
00352         };
00353 
00354         /**
00355         * @brief Property Keys for giving the keys of the collection.
00356         */
00357         property Dictionary<int, Interaction^>::KeyCollection^ Keys
00358         {
00359                 Dictionary<int, Interaction^>::KeyCollection^ get ()  {return aDictionary->Keys;};
00360         };
00361 
00362         /**
00363         * @brief Property [] for giving or setting an interaction object inside the collection.
00364         */
00365         property Interaction^ default[int] {
00366                 Interaction^ get (int index)  {
00367                         //Check if index is valid else throw exception
00368                         try     {return aDictionary[index];}
00369                         catch(KeyNotFoundException^){throw gcnew System::String("Interaction with ID "+index+" does not exist.");};
00370                 };
00371                 void  set (int index, Interaction^ inter) {
00372                         //Try to change else throw exception
00373                         try{
00374                                 //Take ID from the old interaction
00375                                 inter->ID=aDictionary[index]->ID;
00376 
00377                                 //Increase the number of new kind interaction
00378                                 InterKindCount[inter->IntKind]++;
00379 
00380                                 //Update min and max of the eigen values of the specific kind of the new interaction
00381                                 UpdateEigenMinMax(inter, inter->IntKind);
00382 
00383                                 //Reduce the number of old kind interaction
00384                                 InterKindCount[aDictionary[index]->IntKind]--;
00385 
00386                                 //Update min and max of the eigen values of the specific kind of the new interaction
00387                                 UpdateEigenMinMax(inter, aDictionary[index]->IntKind);
00388 
00389                                 //Make the change
00390                                 aDictionary[index]=inter;
00391 
00392 
00393                                 //Fire event
00394                                 OnCollectionChanged(gcnew NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction::Remove, 
00395                                         gcnew KeyValuePair<int, Interaction^>(inter->ID, inter)));
00396                         }
00397                         catch(KeyNotFoundException^){throw gcnew System::String("Interaction with ID "+index+" does not exist.");};
00398                 };
00399         };
00400 
00401 
00402         Dictionary<InteractionKind, int>^ InterKindCount;   ///< Collection of the number of each kind of interactions.
00403         Dictionary<InteractionKind, double>^ InterKindMax;      ///< Collection of the maxima eigen value of each kind of interactions.
00404         Dictionary<InteractionKind, double>^ InterKindMin;      ///< Collection of the minima eigen value of each kind of interactions.
00405         Dictionary<InteractionKind, int>^ iInterKindMax;        ///< Collection of the index of interaction with maxima eigen value of each kind of interactions.
00406         Dictionary<InteractionKind, int>^ iInterKindMin;        ///< Collection of the index of interaction with minima eigen value of each kind of interactions.
00407 
00408 internal:  //like friend
00409         int newID;    ///< One-based ID for the new interaction.
00410         int bondID;       ///< One-based ID for the new bond interaction.
00411 
00412 private:
00413         Dictionary <int, Interaction^> ^ aDictionary; ///< The observable collection of the interactions.
00414         System::Void UpdateEigenMinMax(Interaction^ aInteraction, InteractionKind intKind);
00415         System::Void FilterInteractions(InteractionKind^ kind, double threshold, bool znorm );
00416         System::Void InteractionsDictionaryChange(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventArgs^ e);
00417 
00418         /**
00419         * @brief Event Handler when the interaction collection is changed
00420         * @param e Arguments for when an property changed. Usually a string.
00421         */
00422         virtual System::Void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs^ e) sealed {CollectionChanged(this, e);};
00423 
00424 };

00502 /** \class  ReferenceFramesDictionary

00505 public ref class ReferenceFramesDictionary: INotifyCollectionChanged, 
00506                                                                             INotifyPropertyChanged
00507 {
00508 public:
00509         ReferenceFramesDictionary(InteractionsDictionary ^%aInteractions);
00510 
00511         /**
00512         * @brief Event for when something changes inside the collection.
00513         */
00514         virtual event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler^ CollectionChanged;
00515 
00516         /**
00517         * @brief Event for when a property changes. Not used
00518         */
00519         virtual event PropertyChangedEventHandler^ PropertyChanged;
00520 
00521         //Other functions
00522         System::Void Add(ReferenceFrame^ frame);
00523         System::Void Clear();
00524         System::Void RemoveAt(int aID); 
00525         System::Void MakeFrameLabFrame(ReferenceFrame^ frame);
00526         
00527         //Properties
00528 
00529         /**
00530         * @brief Property Count for giving the number of reference frames in the collection.
00531         */
00532         property int Count {
00533                 int get ()  {return newID-1;};
00534         };
00535         
00536         /**
00537         * @brief Property Keys for giving the keys of the collection.
00538         */
00539         property Dictionary<int, ReferenceFrame^>::KeyCollection^ Keys{
00540                 Dictionary<int, ReferenceFrame^>::KeyCollection^ get ()  {return aDictionary->Keys;};
00541         };
00542 
00543         /**
00544         * @brief Property [] for giving or setting an reference frame object inside the collection.
00545         */
00546         property ReferenceFrame^ default[int] {
00547                 ReferenceFrame^ get (int index)  {
00548                         //Check if index is valid else thro exception
00549                         try     {return aDictionary[index];}
00550                         catch(KeyNotFoundException^){throw gcnew System::String("Reference Frame with ID "+index+" does not exist.");};
00551                 };
00552                 void  set (int index, ReferenceFrame^ frame) {
00553                         //Try to change else throw exception
00554                         try{
00555                                 //Set the ID form the old one and set the event handler of the reference frame
00556                                 frame->ID=aDictionary[index]->ID;
00557                                 frame->PropertyChanged+=gcnew System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventHandler(
00558                                         this,&ReferenceFramesDictionary::ReferenceFramesDictionaryChange);
00559 
00560                                 //Make the change
00561                                 aDictionary[index]=frame;
00562 
00563                                 //Refresh interactions using the new reference frame
00564                                 ReferenceFramesDictionaryChange( aDictionary[index],
00565                                         gcnew System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventArgs("Reference Frame")); 
00566 
00567                                 //Fire event
00568                                 OnCollectionChanged(gcnew NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction::Remove, 
00569                                         gcnew KeyValuePair<int, ReferenceFrame^>(frame->ID, frame)));
00570                         }
00571                         catch(KeyNotFoundException^){throw gcnew System::String("Reference Frame with ID "+index+" does not exist.");};
00572                 };
00573         };
00574 
00575 
00576 
00577 internal:  //like friend
00578         int newID;    ///< One-based ID for the new reference frame.
00579 
00580 private:
00581         Dictionary <int, ReferenceFrame^> ^ aDictionary; ///< The observable collection of the reference frames.
00582         InteractionsDictionary ^Interactions;                    ///< The observable collection of the interactions.
00583         System::Void TransformToFrame(ReferenceFrame^ frame,Tensor ^% inter);
00584         bool CheckDescendantRecurcively(ReferenceFrame^ Parent, ReferenceFrame^ Descendant);
00585         System::Void ReIDRecurcively(Dictionary <int, ReferenceFrame^> ^% , ReferenceFrame^ , int & );
00586         System::Void ReferenceFramesDictionaryChange(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventArgs^ e);
00587 
00588         /**
00589         * @brief Event Handler when the reference frame collection is changed
00590         * @param e Arguments for when an property changed. Usually a string.
00591         */
00592         virtual System::Void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs^ e) sealed {CollectionChanged(this, e);};
00593 };

00679                 {
00680                         //Remember old element
00681                         String^ iso=aIsotope->Element;
00682 
00683                         //Flag for changing from spin different of 0.5 to euqal to zero
00684                         bool chspin=aIsotope->Spin!=0.5 && anotherIsotope->Spin==0.5;
00685 
00686                         //Change the isotope and fire the change event
00687                         aIsotope=anotherIsotope;
00688                         OnPropertyChanged(gcnew PropertyChangedEventArgs((chspin? "SpinChange ":"" )+ "Isotope $"+iso));
00689                 }
00690         };
00691 
00692 
00693 internal:
00694         double x,y,z;              ///< The x,y,z coordinates of the atom.
00695         Isotope ^ aIsotope;        ///< The isotope of the atom.
00696         System::String^ label; ///< The label of the atom.
00697 
00698         /**
00699         * @brief Event Handler when the atom is changed
00700         * @param e Arguments for when an property changed. Usually a string.
00701         */
00702         virtual System::Void OnPropertyChanged(PropertyChangedEventArgs^ e) sealed {PropertyChanged(this, e);};
00703 };
00704 
00705 /** \class  AtomsDictionary
00706 *  Class for storing an observable Atom or spin collection.
00707 */
00708 public ref class AtomsDictionary: INotifyCollectionChanged, 
00709                                                                   INotifyPropertyChanged
00710 {
00711 public:
00712         AtomsDictionary(InteractionsDictionary ^%aInteractions);
00713 
00714         /**
00715         * @brief Event for when something changes inside the collection.
00716         */
00717         virtual event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler^ CollectionChanged;
00718 
00719         /**
00720         * @brief Event for when a property changes. Not used
00721         */
00722         virtual event PropertyChangedEventHandler^ PropertyChanged; 
00723 
00724         /**
00725         * @brief Getter for the number of electrons in the collection.
00726         * @result Return number of electrons
00727         */
00728         int get_electron_number(){return electron_number;};
00729 
00730         //Other functions
00731         System::Void Clear();
00732         System::Void Add(Atom^ atom);
00733         System::Void RemoveAt(int aID);
00734 
00735         //Properties
00736 
00737         /**
00738         * @brief Property refresh for giving or setting the refreshing flag of the atom collection
00739         * in order to control if the bonds and coordinate maxima are recalculated.
00740         */
00741         property bool Refreshing{
00742                 bool get() {return refresh;}
00743                 void  set(bool Refresh) 
00744                 { 
00745                         //When the previous state is not refreshing and is change to true
00746                         if(!refresh && Refresh)
00747                         {
00748                                 refresh=Refresh;
00749                                 //Recalculate bond distances
00750 
00751                                 //Loop over all bond interactions
00752                                 for(int i=-1;i>Interactions->bondID;i--)
00753                                 {
00754                                         Atom^ A=((Interaction^)Interactions[i])->A;
00755                                         Atom^ B=((Interaction^)Interactions[i])->B;
00756 
00757                                         //Calculating the distance
00758                                         double distance=sqrt((A->X-B->X)*(A->X-B->X)+(A->Y-B->Y)*(A->Y-B->Y)+(A->Z-B->Z)*(A->Z-B->Z));
00759 
00760                                         //Setting to the tensor matrix
00761 					::Matrix3x3 ^Matrix=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00762                                         Matrix[0]=distance; Matrix[4]=distance; Matrix[8]=distance;
00763                                         Matrix[1]=0.0; Matrix[2]=0.0; Matrix[3]=0.0; 
00764                                         Matrix[5]=0.0; Matrix[6]=0.0; Matrix[7]=0.0;
00765                                         ((Tensor^)Interactions[i])->matrix3x3=Matrix;
00766 
00767                                 };
00768 
00769                                 MinX=MinY=MinZ=dMax;
00770                                 MaxX=MaxY=MaxZ=-dMax;
00771 
00772                                 //Loop over all atoms to find minim and maximum coordinates
00773                                 for each(int i in aDictionary->Keys) 
00774                                 {       
00775                                         if(aDictionary[i]->isotope->Element!="e")
00776                                         {
00777                                                 //Check if Atom is maximum or minimum and save ID
00778                                                 if(aDictionary[i]->X < MinX) {MinX=aDictionary[i]->X; iMinX=aDictionary[i]->ID;}
00779                                                 if(aDictionary[i]->X > MaxX) {MaxX=aDictionary[i]->X; iMaxX=aDictionary[i]->ID;}
00780                                                 if(aDictionary[i]->Y < MinY) {MinY=aDictionary[i]->Y; iMinY=aDictionary[i]->ID;}
00781                                                 if(aDictionary[i]->Y > MaxY) {MaxY=aDictionary[i]->Y; iMaxY=aDictionary[i]->ID;}
00782                                                 if(aDictionary[i]->Z < MinZ) {MinZ=aDictionary[i]->Z; iMinZ=aDictionary[i]->ID;}
00783                                                 if(aDictionary[i]->Z > MaxZ) {MaxZ=aDictionary[i]->Z; iMaxZ=aDictionary[i]->ID;}
00784                                         }
00785                                 }
00786                         }
00787                         refresh=Refresh;
00788                 }
00789         };
00790 
00791         /**
00792         * @brief Property Count for giving the number of atom in the collection.
00793         */
00794         property int Count {
00795                 int get ()  {return aDictionary->Count;};
00796         };
00797 
00798         /**
00799         * @brief Property Keys for giving the keys of the collection.
00800         */
00801         property Dictionary<int, Atom^>::KeyCollection^ Keys{
00802                 Dictionary<int, Atom^>::KeyCollection^ get ()  {return aDictionary->Keys;};
00803         };
00804 
00805         /**
00806         * @brief Property [] for giving or setting an Atom object inside the collection.
00807         */
00808         property Atom^ default[int]{
00809                 Atom^ get (int index)  {
00810                         //Check if index is valid else throw exception
00811                         try     {return aDictionary[index];}
00812                         catch(KeyNotFoundException^){throw gcnew System::String("Atom with ID "+index+" does not exist.");};
00813                 };
00814                 void  set (int index, Atom^ atom) {
00815                         //Try to change else throw exception
00816                         try{
00817                                 //Remember old element
00818                                 String^ iso=aDictionary[index]->aIsotope->Element;
00819 
00820                                 //Flag for checking spin
00821                                 bool chspin=aDictionary[index]->aIsotope->Spin!=0.5 && atom->aIsotope->Spin==0.5;
00822 
00823                                 //Deep copy
00824                                 aDictionary[index]->aIsotope=atom->aIsotope;
00825                                 aDictionary[index]->x=atom->x;
00826                                 aDictionary[index]->y=atom->y;
00827                                 aDictionary[index]->z=atom->z;
00828                                 aDictionary[index]->label=atom->label;
00829 
00830                                 //Check if change is valid
00831                                 AtomsDictionaryChange( aDictionary[index],
00832                                         gcnew System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventArgs(
00833                                         (chspin? "SpinChange ":"" )+ "X Y Z Isotope $"+iso)); 
00834 
00835                                 //Fire event
00836                                 OnCollectionChanged(gcnew NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction::Remove, 
00837                                         gcnew KeyValuePair<int, Atom^>(aDictionary[index]->getID(),
00838                                         aDictionary[index])));
00839                         }
00840                         catch(KeyNotFoundException^){throw gcnew System::String("Atom with ID "+index+" does not exist.");};
00841                 };
00842         }
00843         
00844 
00845         double MinX,MinY,MinZ; ///< Minimum of coordinates of the collection.
00846         double MaxX,MaxY,MaxZ; ///< Maximum of coordinates of the collection.
00847 
00848 private:
00849         Dictionary <int, Atom^> ^ aDictionary;  ///< The observable collection of the atoms.
00850         int newID;                                                              ///< One-based ID for the new element.
00851         int electron_number;                                    ///< Electron number in the collection.
00852         bool refresh;                                                   ///< Flag for refreshing of the bonds.
00853         int iMinX,iMinY,iMinZ;                                  ///< Save which element is Minimum of coordinates.
00854         int iMaxX,iMaxY,iMaxZ;                                  ///< Save which element is Maximum of coordinates.
00855         InteractionsDictionary ^Interactions;   ///< The observable collection of the interactions.
00856 
00857         /**
00858         * @brief Event Handler when the atom collection is changed
00859         * @param e Arguments for when an property changed. Usually a string.
00860         */
00861         virtual System::Void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs^ e) sealed{CollectionChanged(this, e);};
00862 
00863         System::Void AtomsDictionaryChange(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::PropertyChangedEventArgs^ e);
00864 };
00865 
00866 #pragma endregion
00867

00869 /** \class  Model
00870 *  Class for storing an observable Model with all of its properties.
00871 */
00872 public ref class Model:INotifyPropertyChanged
00873 {

00877         Model( const Model % aModel);
00878         Model% operator=( Model aModel);

00882         InteractionsDictionary^ InteractionCollection;  ///< The collection of interactions in the model.
00883         ReferenceFramesDictionary^ RefFrameCollection;  ///< The collection of reference frames in the model.
00884

00886         * @brief Event for when something changes inside the model object
00887         */

00889

00891 
00892 private:

00897         * @param e Arguments for when an property changed. Usually a string.
00898         */
00899         virtual System::Void OnPropertyChanged(PropertyChangedEventArgs^ e) sealed {PropertyChanged(this, e);};
00900 };
